title: Cutey Honey Flash: The Movie
alternative_title: Cutie Honey F: The Movie, Cutey Honey Flash, Cutey Honey F (1997), キューティーハニーＦ（ﾌﾗｯｼｭ）
description: Honey Kisaragi is a perfectly normal beautiful high school student. Until her scientist father is kidnapped by the evil organization Panther Claw, that is. But her father left behind a device she can use to transform into the red-haired sword-wielding heroine Cutey Honey.
